莍字的基本解释

莍
qiú
果实外皮密生疣状突起的腺体。

莍字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiú］
［《廣韻》巨鳩切，平尤，羣。］
椒类果实表皮密生疣状突起的腺体。

莍字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　莍； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1033第31
【唐韻】巨鳩切【集韻】【韻會】渠尤切，?音求。【說文】茮榝，實裏如表者。【爾雅·釋木】椒、榝醜，莍。【註】茱萸子聚生成房貌。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋草】椒榝醜莍。〕　謹照原書釋草改釋木。
莍字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
莍字的起名意思

暂无。

Xun
Basic explanation of words
Xun
qiú
The fruit skin is densely covered with verrucous and protruding glands.
Xun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiú］
["Guangyun" Giant Dove Cut, Ping You, Group. ]
The epidermis of pepper fruits is densely covered with verrucous and protruding glands.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Ci characters department] 　莍; Kangxi strokes: 13; page number: page 1033 31
[Tang Yun] Giant Dove Cut [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] Qu Youqie,? Yinqiu. [Said the text] 茮榝, in fact, like the table. 【Erya·Shimu】Jiaojiao, Chou Chou, Nian. [Note] Cornel seeds gather to form a house appearance. Textual research: 〔【Erya·Shucao】The ugly prickly pear. 〔〕 　 I would like to change the description of the wood according to the original book.
